page.title: 10A Typical School Day.
page.content: I wake up on a Friday morning about 7.30 and get up about 7.35. I go downstairs have a bath get dressed and have my breakfast. I clear the table and go to wash my hands and face and clean my teeth. I go to school on my bicycle. At school we have an assembly and then Hymn practice. After that we have News with Mrs Vickers. We have our dinners at school they cost 51p. In the afternoon we change our library books. Sometimes we have P.E. After school I go to Gym club for an hour. When I get home my sister and I go for our Piano lessons. When we come back we have our tea and go to the Youth Club at Sunday School. When we get back we go to bed so that we are ready for an early start the next day.
